rainfalls:
Rainfall Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 5:00 PM, 10 June 2025(Tuesday)



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains are expected over Nueva Ecija, Bulacan, Pampanga and Tarlac.



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Cavite, Metro Manila, Rizal, Laguna, Batangas, Bataan, Zambales(Olongapo, San Marcelino, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe, Cabangan, Subic, Castillejos) and Quezon(General Nakar, Polillo, Real, Infanta, Mauban, Sampaloc, Lucban, Tayabas, Candelaria, Dolores, Tiaong, San Antonio, Sariaya) and may affect nearby areas.



The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
